I am a dedicated and enthusiastic Statistician specializing in the field of Economics, driven by a profound love for Python programming. With an insatiable curiosity for data and its profound impact on economic phenomena.

Currently research assistant at [African School of Economics](https://www.africanschoolofeconomics.com/) in Abomey-Calavi, Benin.

My research areas are microeconomics, political economy, development economics.


{{< fa graduation-cap >}} Master in Mathematics Economics and Statistics (MMES)  &#8729; African School of Economics  &#8729;  2023

{{< fa graduation-cap >}} Bachelor in Statistics  &#8729; University of Abomey-Calavi | ENEAM  &#8729;  2019
